title: Game Bugs out so i cant log in champion and get a dodge
body: anyone else having an issue where the client freezes and then you get locked out of a que and lose lp for it? I have had it happe no nmultiple occasions

replies.body:
Are you using any third party programs like play.tv, lolrecorder, overlay, etc?  They've been known to cause issues like this especially during champion select.  Disable them if that's the case for you.  

Otherwise, your network might be losing connection and leaving you behind so champion select can't communicate information anymore.  This can result in a freeze that you explain.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that resolved.

Let me know if that helps!
When you say your client freezes, where exactly is that happening?  Is it in champion select, loading screen, or while in-game?  Are you getting any error messages?  Let me know!
